Class com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.subscriptions.SubscriptionKey
Inherited members: ShowHide

View: ClientSubclassPackageImplementation
com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.subscriptions

Class SubscriptionKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.subscriptions.SubscriptionKey
  • public final class SubscriptionKey extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies the Keys that are used within the Subscription Service. Clients implementing a Subscription Service use these keys to provide the correct meta data to the SDK in their overridden ISubscriptionsProvider.getAssetParamsForSubscription(String, Map) methods.
    • Fields

      An asset ID that uniquely identifies the Asset within the remote catalog

      Constant Field Values
      ASSET_SUBTYPE 
      static java.lang.String ASSET_SUBTYPE
      The integer subtype of an Asset.
      public static final java.lang.String ASSET_SUBTYPE
      The integer subtype of an Asset. Used to identify different types of segmented assets.
      Mandatory if this is a segmented asset type (ASSET_TYPE is AssetIdentifierType.SEGMENTED_ASSET_IDENTIFIER) and the default implementation of getAssetParamsForSubscription is being used to create the asset. One of ISegmentedAsset.SEG_FILE_TYPE_HLS, ISegmentedAsset.SEG_FILE_TYPE_HSS, ISegmentedAsset.SEG_FILE_TYPE_MPD. If getAssetParamsForSubscription is being overridden then it is not necessary to return this subtype. Type: Integer
      See Also:
      ISegmentedAsset, Common.AssetIdentifierType, Constant Field Values
      ASSET_TYPE 
      static java.lang.String ASSET_TYPE
      The type of Asset to be created.
      public static final java.lang.String ASSET_TYPE
      The type of Asset to be created. Either Common.AssetIdentiferType.FILE_IDENTIFIER or Common.AssetIdentiferType.SEGMENTED_ASSET_IDENTIFIER.
      Mandatory if default implementation of getAssetParamsForSubscription is being used to create the asset. If getAssetParamsForSubscription is being overridden then it is not necessary to return this type. Type: Integer
      See Also:
      Common.AssetIdentifierType, Constant Field Values

      FEED_CAN_DELETE 
      static java.lang.String FEED_CAN_DELETE
      Value that applies when SDK is already storing "max episodes per feed" for a feed and a new episode is available for download in that feed.
      public static final java.lang.String FEED_CAN_DELETE
      Value that applies when SDK is already storing "max episodes per feed" for a feed and a new episode is available for download in that feed. If this value is true, SDK must auto-delete oldest episode and then download new episode. If false, client must not download new episode.
      Optional Boolean
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values
      FEED_MAX_ITEMS 
      static java.lang.String FEED_MAX_ITEMS
      The SDK will never automatically store more than this number of episodes for a single feed.
      public static final java.lang.String FEED_MAX_ITEMS
      The SDK will never automatically store more than this number of episodes for a single feed. Non-subscription-related actions, such as a manual download request from the user, may cause the number of downloaded episodes to exceed this number.
      Optional Integer
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

      public static final java.lang.String PERMITTED_MIME_TYPES
      A list of string values representing the valid MIME types for this download. If provided, only MIME types in the list will result in completed downloads. Other types will result in error. Defaults to engine default types.
      Optional Type: List
